id.description: The unique identifier of the team template

title.description: The title or name of the team template

subject.description: The subject or title of the team template

body.description: The main content or body of the team template

body_preview.description: A preview of the main content or body of the team template

created_at.description: The date and time when the team template was created

updated_at.description: The date and time of the last update made to the team template

last_used_at.description: The date and time when the team template was last used

archived_at.description: The date and time when the team template was archived

last_modified_at.description: The date and time of the last modification made to the team template

open_tracking_enabled.description: Indicates if open tracking is enabled for the team template

click_tracking_enabled.description: Indicates if click tracking is enabled for the team template

counts.description: Counts related to the team template interactions

last_modified_user.description: User details who last modified the team template

_links.description: Links related to the team template

tags.description: Tags assigned to the team template
